block.name: Noise Source
block.doc: Implements a noise source. The distribution of the noise can be selected from various standard distributions.

param.name: Output Type
param.doc: Sets the data type of the output stream.

param.name: Noise Type
param.doc: Selects the statistical distribution of the noise.

param.name: Amplitude
param.doc: Sets the amplitude of the output. For this will affect the statistical characteristics of the noise source. For example, it will affect the standard deviation of the Gaussian source.

param.name: Seed
param.doc: Sets the seed for the random number generator used to create the noise source. For most purposes, the default value is sufficient.
